languages.text: Отвратительное создание из плоти и металла бродит по улью, проводя эксперименты над трупами. Его защищают не только ксеносы, но и ужасающие конструкты — парящие орудия пыток.

traits.locale_text: Отвратительное создание из плоти и металла бродит по улью, проводя эксперименты над трупами. Его защищают не только ксеносы, но и ужасающие конструкты — парящие орудия пыток.

languages.text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.
languages.original_text: Отвратительное создание из плоти и металла бродит по улью, проводя эксперименты над трупами. Его защищают не только ксеносы, но и ужасающие конструкты — парящие орудия пыток.

traits.locale_text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.
A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.
A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.
A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.

languages.text: 一只由肉体与金属构成的恐怖生物正在巢都中游荡，用各种各样的尸体做实验。它的身边围绕着许多异形与可怕造物，那些浮在空中的造物都是异形用来折磨猎物的工具。
languages.original_text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.

traits.locale_text: 一只由肉体与金属构成的恐怖生物正在巢都中游荡，用各种各样的尸体做实验。它的身边围绕着许多异形与可怕造物，那些浮在空中的造物都是异形用来折磨猎物的工具。

languages.text: 肉と金属の忌まわしい生き物がハイヴを徘徊し、死体で実験を行っている。それは異種族と恐ろしい建造物 — 浮遊拷問器具の両者によって保護されている。
languages.original_text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.

traits.locale_text: 肉と金属の忌まわしい生き物がハイヴを徘徊し、死体で実験を行っている。それは異種族と恐ろしい建造物 — 浮遊拷問器具の両者によって保護されている。

languages.text: Una criatura repugnante de carne y metal acecha en la colmena, realizando experimentos con los cadáveres. La protegen tanto xenos como creaciones aterradoras: instrumentos de tortura flotantes.
languages.original_text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.

traits.locale_text: Una criatura repugnante de carne y metal acecha en la colmena, realizando experimentos con los cadáveres. La protegen tanto xenos como creaciones aterradoras: instrumentos de tortura flotantes.

languages.text: Eine abscheuliche Kreatur aus Fleisch und Metall führt in der Makropole Experimente mit Leichen durch. Sie wird von Xenos und Furcht erregenden Konstrukten beschützt ... schwebenden Folterinstrumenten.
languages.original_text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.

traits.locale_text: Eine abscheuliche Kreatur aus Fleisch und Metall führt in der Makropole Experimente mit Leichen durch. Sie wird von Xenos und Furcht erregenden Konstrukten beschützt ... schwebenden Folterinstrumenten.

languages.text: Une créature repoussante toute de chair et de métal rôde dans la ruche et mène des expériences sur les cadavres. Elle est protégée par des xénos et des assemblages terrifiants, de véritables instruments de torture flottants.
languages.original_text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.

traits.locale_text: Une créature repoussante toute de chair et de métal rôde dans la ruche et mène des expériences sur les cadavres. Elle est protégée par des xénos et des assemblages terrifiants, de véritables instruments de torture flottants.

languages.text: Et ve metalden oluşan iğrenç bir yaratık, kovanda kol gezip cesetler üzerinde deneyler gerçekleştiriyor. Hem zenolar hem de dehşet verici uçan işkence aygıtları tarafından korunuyor.
languages.original_text: A repulsive creature of flesh and metal roams the hive, conducting experiments on corpses. It is protected both by xenos and terrifying constructs — floating torture instruments.

traits.locale_text: Et ve metalden oluşan iğrenç bir yaratık kovanda kol geziyor ve cesetler üzerinde deneyler gerçekleştiriyor. Hem zenolar hem de dehşet verici uçan işkence aygıtları tarafından korunuyor.
